sections.title: Short Description
sections.description: Please write down a short description of the project.There are three things you should include: how your project was developed and published (what frameworks and open source issues exist and what hasn't been accomplished), your idea for solving it, and what your project can do.

attributes.placeholder:
<Example> 
 The challenge is that using only the official framework for handling hogehoge is cumbersome for users to write. My idea is to solve this problem by providing a simple interface to wrap these codes and handle the hogehoge process. My project provides a wrapper library that you can use to write simple code to handle hogehoge.

sections.title: Demo
sections.description: Please upload a resource (image/animated GIF) and input a description for a demonstration.

attributes.placeholder: We recommend that you show them how it works with images, especially if it includes a user interface.

sections.title: Advantages
sections.description: Please describe the advantages of the project. You should describe in this section the benefits of your project to users compared to other open source and frameworks.

attributes.placeholder:
<Example> 
 - Concise code description is possible.
 - There are no dependencies with other libraries, and you only need to install this project to use it.
 - It uses the APIs of the official frameworks, so it works fast.

sections.title: Installation
sections.description: Please describe how to install the project. You write scripts for the environment in which you will be running, the dependencies you will need to implement, and the shells you will need to install.

sections.title: Deployment
sections.description: Please describe how to deploy the project. This may not be necessary for all projects, but please write any code or procedures you need to deploy, such as working with the necessary dependencies.
